titles.title: Bind Us Together, Lord. Bind Us Together

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bind us together, Lord. Bind us together,
With cords that cannot be broken.
Bind us together, Lord. Bind us together.
Lord, bind us together with love.
There is only one God
There is only one King.
There is only one body.
That is why we sing.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Haznos unirnos, Dios. Haznos unirnos Dios,
Con cuerdas que no se rompan.
Haznos unirnos, Dios. Haznos unirnos Dios,
Con cuerdas de amor.
Ai solo un Dios.
Ai solo un Rei.
Ai solo un cuerpo.
Por eso cantare.
